items.title: ‘The Housemaid’ Snaps Sydney Sweeney’s Rotten Tomatoes Streak
items.description: Sydney Sweeney's new movie, The Housemaid, has broken a Rotten Tomatoes streak of underperforming films. It could do so at the box office, as well.

items.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Saturday, December 20

items.title: iOS 18.7.3—Which iPhones Can Run Apple’s Critical New Update?
items.description: Apple has released iOS 18.7.3, but it's not available for all iPhones. As Apple tries to push users to iOS 26.2, which iPhones can run iOS 18.7.3?

items.title: DraftKings Enters Prediction Markets With New App
items.description: The success of Kalshi and Polymarket has prompted a raft of competitors to launch similar products.
